attributes.action: We have no confidence in this govt. We demand an immediate general election.
attributes.additional_details:
We do not believe Boris Johnson didn't realise he was at a Party. 
We believe that most Tory ministers have behaved & continue to behave without integrity.  
We think this govt is negligently managing the pandemic & the NHS,
& making things financially worse for those least well off & others.
We believe this govt is dishonest, & doing things which are making our country worse, & reducing our rights incl. these bills: Elections Bill. Police, Crime, Sentencing & Courts, 
Nationality & Borders Bill
attributes.background: We want you to realise that the public do not support you, or the way you are governing & for you to accept that you do not represent us, & that we believe you are not governing competently or morally. And that we believe the only way forward is to call a general election now. That is what we want.
